name: Momin Uddin
text: They have a variety of toppings and different combinations you can try for your favorite pizza.  It was a reasonable wait (10min approximately) and they seen busy. The pizza was amazing; tastes authentic and not as oily or heavy as some places. Definitely a must try for pizza lovers.

name: C ealdi
text: This place is awesome. The people who work there are super friendly, the pizza is delicious and the crust is amazing. All of the toppings I've tried so far have been fresh and flavorful and they add a generous amount. We just discovered it a couple weeks ago and we've been back four times already.  Highly recommended.

name: Fela Walker
text: Excellent customer service. I had a vegan pizza and it was good, even the vegan cheese which I'm usually not a fan of. I will be back :)

name: Wyn Chan
text: Excellent service and pizza! We brought our friend for dinner tonite, the cashier knew my friend is visiting so she gave us a free no name cake to try.  One pizza was a little burnt, they gladly made another one for us right away. We enjoy our dinner very much, thank you for all the good work!
